meanings.definition: In a location outside of the normal or usual place.
meanings.sent1: She placed the vase ectopically on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The bird flew ectopically towards the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat ectopically on top of the fridge, pretending to be a statue.
meanings.sent4: The music echoed ectopically through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone ectopically in the daytime sky, creating a magical sight.

meanings.definition: Occurring in an abnormal position or place.
meanings.sent1: The ectopically positioned chair looked out of place in the room.
meanings.sent2: The ectopically grown plant puzzled the gardeners.
meanings.sent3: The ectopically placed painting seemed to be playing hide and seek with the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her ectopically dyed hair caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent5: The ectopically positioned moon cast an eerie glow over the landscape.
